responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[24F282B6434E981D3FBC5B9E3C7849C5]", "1175D2BC4895F3615193699B4B7EE048", "There\'s a smaller passage, an old access tunnel. It\'s probably not on any map these things are using. Might get you to Hammer Rest if you\'re keen on avoiding the worst of this. But look, we\'re stuck here trying to figure out what makes these constructs tick and how to stop them from overrunning us. If they push past Gritstone, the portal itself could be at risk. I need people willing to face the unknown, to help us break their hold and understand this threat.")
name: ANV_FTUE_0007_Commander_GrettaIronhand_7_Response
